com.github.besherman.lifx

Interface LFXAlarmCollection

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Iterable<LFXAlarm>

    public interface LFXAlarmCollection
extends Iterable<LFXAlarm>
    A collection of alarms for a light. The protocol allows for 256 different alarms but the current firmware (1.5) only supports 2 alarms. See size() for the number of alarms supported. Note that the light gives a reference to its alarm collection before the collection is guaranteed to be loaded so if size() is 0 it may still be loading. The alarm collection is only loaded once when the light is discovered. To update the alarms call load().
